DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare effect diet different glycemic load ( GL ) body composition biochemical marker overweight obese subject 12-month period .
DOC.detailed_description: Study Procedure : The study randomize , experimental , parallel design conduct group Mexican subject 6-month period . Anthropometric biochemical data determine 0 , 3 , 6 , 9 12 month . Subjects : Overweight obese adult assign two group : LGL diet HGL diet . Subjects pregnant diabetes , cancer , psychiatric disorder physical disability exclude . Diets Dietary Assessment : Two diet design include LGL HGL diet . GI value food estimate table Foster-Powell et al . Daily GL determine product total dietary carbohydrate ( gram ) GI food adjust energetic intake use follow formula : GI = Σ ( GI food X proportion total carbohydrate contribute food ) ; GL= Σ ( GI food × gram total carbohydrate food ) /1000 kcal . Diets design accord food habit Mexicans live Tijuana area . On first day , subject receive different menu either LGL HGL diet , accord randomization . A research assistant available mail phone question 6-month period . An e-mail , reminder reinforcement maintain diet , send every 2 week participant . Subjects complete 3-day dietary record ( two weekdays one weekend day ) include analysis . Anthropometric Measurements : Height measure near millimeter use portable stadiometer ( model 214 Road Rod , Seca Corp. , Hanover , MD ) . Weight measure near 0.1 kg use electronic scale ( Bod Pod , Life Measurement Inc. , Concord , CA ) . Subjects dress light clothing wearing shoe . Body mass index ( BMI ) calculate use follow formula : weight ( kg ) /height ( m2 ) . Waist circumference ( WC ) measure minimum circumference iliac crest rib cage . Fat mass ( kg ) total body fat percentage measure plethysmography Bod Pod . The subject enter Bod Pod wear bodysuit Lycra hat . Blood Analysis : Venous blood sample take 8 AM antecubital vein 12-hour overnight fast , baseline 3 month begin study . Blood sample centrifuge 3500 × g 3 minute , plasma remove analyzed immediately collection . For quantitative determination glucose serum , glucose oxidase procedure base modify Trinder method use ( SERA-PAK Plus , Bayer , Sées , France ) . Serum insulin level determine chemiluminescent immunoassay IMMULITE 2000 analyzer ( Diagnostic Products Corporation , Los Angeles , CA ) . Homeostasis model assessment ( HOMA ) use estimate insulin resistance compute follow : ( fast serum insulin [ μU/ml ] × fast plasma glucose [ mmol/L ] /22.5 ) . Total cholesterol , HDL-cholesterol triglyceride measure enzymatic method ( SERA-PAK Plus ) ; LDL-cholesterol calculate use Friedwald formula : LDL ( mmol/L ) = total cholesterol - ( TG/2.2 ) - HDL . Physical Activity Assessment : A questionnaire contain seven question International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ ) use evaluate physical activity baseline 1 , 3 6 month study initiation . Statistical Analysis : Mean ± standard deviation calculate use descriptive statistic variable . Anthropometric measurement evaluate , determine meet normality test ( Kolmogorov-Smirnov Shapiro-Wilk ) . To test difference group biochemical anthropometric measurement , Mann-Whitney non-parametric test independent sample perform . For comparison difference , 3 6 month intervention treatment group , use Friedman non-parametric test repeat measurement . To test difference group diet intake baseline end study , Mann-Whitney non-parametric test independent sample perform .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese adult Subjects pregnant diabetes , cancer , psychiatric disorder physical disability
